title: CIA publishes recruitment video aimed at disaffected Chinese soldiers
summary_full: Army in turmoil after Xi Jinping placed top general under investigation for suspected corruption last monthThe CIA (the US’s Central Intelligence Agency) has published a Mandarin-language recruitment video aimed at Chinese soldiers, in an apparent attempt to capitalise on the recent instability in the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) after a series of high-level purges.The video, published on the CIA’s YouTube channel on Thursday, is titled The Reason for Stepping Forward: To Save the Future.
